Due to such hegemony many people follow the ruling classes by consent , with no need for violence .

B ) Socialism has historically been seen as an alternative to capitalism , but ( and this is a very significant and huge point to keep in mind ) after the failures of socialist experiments in USSR and PRC we need to be very specific and particular about exactly what do we mean by socialism , and how it is different from what happened in Russia and China .

Simply put , how are we to ensure , guarantee and institutionalize self - organization of the working class and make sure that another bureaucracy does n't take over and rule in the name of working class while actually exploiting them ( which is what happened in USSR and PRC ) .
